title: Test
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Life expectancy at birth in years has decreased over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
Max Life expectancy at birth in years about 75.26 was recorded at Year 2007
Min Life expectancy at birth in years about 74.9 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
